Text: October Production Reservation and Commodity mailoutsIn a joint effort between NNG Marketing and Gas Logistics attached are monthly invoicing calendars from November to June Each month details when reservation and commodity preliminary invoices are available and the dates when invoices are mailed to the customers The following information summarizes critical days for October Production Month Reservation and Commodity invoice mailings October Prod Month RESERVATION Market Services will be mailing out RESERVATION invoices on Thursday Nov Please make any rate changes in CMS before PM Monday Oct If you make any rate changes to a contract in CMS on Tuesday or Wednesday Oct or PLEASE CALL the Market Service representative responsible for that contract ASAP before pm so they can repath the contract in the accounting system before invoices are mailed out October Prod Month COMMODITY Market Services will be mailing out Commodity invoices on Monday Nov Please make any rate changes in CMS before pm Thursday Nov If you make any rate changes to a contract in CMS on Friday Nov PLEASE CALL the Market Service representative responsible for that contract ASAP before pm that day so they can repath the contract in the accounting system Please contact Raetta Zadow or myself if you have any questions Larry Berger

RE TAS Heads up Cc Raetta and I will meet about it and we will let you know Thanks Larry Original Message From Blair Lynn Sent Tuesday October PM To Zadow Raetta Berger Larry Cc Dietz Rick Subject FW TAS Heads up Importance High Raetta and Larry is there anything special we can do now to make Januarys rebill easier Thanks Lynn Original Message From Bianchi Rita Sent Tuesday October AM To Blair Lynn Zadow Raetta Berger Larry Karas Phylis Cc Fugel Robert Dasilva Esther Davis Larry Bisbee Joanne Subject TAS Heads up Importance High Northern is close to a Settlement with our customers involving Carlton and the SLA This will entail some special invoice processing We expect to file revised Reservation TI Commodity and Carlton surcharge rates to be effective November However the filing probably wont be made before November and we arent likely to have approval until the end of the year That means that November will be billed at the existing winter rates and we will need to do a month refund in January to rebill November at the new rates We hope to have approval in time to bill both Reservation Commodity correctly for December But on the Reservation invoice we may need to do a late preliminary run to pick up new rates depending on when we receive an order from FERC

NNG Flowing Gas Documents Cc Rick and Lynn I just wanted to give you an official memo that the NNG Flowing Gas Documents are now online with both the Reservation Commodity Variance and Imbalance invoices and their supporting documents NNG Customers are able to view both the Aug and Sep accounting month reports The customer can also view the original Flowing Gas documents Contract Imbalance Shipper Imbalance Invoices Reservation and Commodity only Allocation and Measurement Information from May to Aug accounting months via a hyperlink to Actuate During the next couple of months I will still be working with the NNG reps and customers on various issues regarding the Flowing Gas reports for instance researching why the customer cannot access certain documents I will also be meeting with Legale and IT weekly on enhancements to Flowing Gas that are needed See me if you have questions Larry

RE Measurement Detail Cc I now have this meeting on my calendar Thanks Larry Original Message From Blair Lynn Sent Friday December PM To Sebesta Chris Berger Larry Jeff Hicken Email Cc Garcia Ava Subject RE Measurement Detail Chris I have this meeting on my calendar Thanks Lynn Original Message From Sebesta Chris Sent Friday December PM To Blair Lynn Berger Larry Jeff Hicken Email Cc Garcia Ava Subject Measurement Detail A conference call has been scheduled for Thursday December at PM to review the measurement data Alliant would like to have access to electronically and the data Northern can provide I will initiate the call Please let me know if your schedules change Chris Sebesta Northern Natural Gas Office Fax

RE NNG Reps out of office on Dec and Lynn We can talk about this tomorrow morning but I feel Jean Adams Kathy Sturr for South Central and Pat Barry Renee for the North Larry Original Message From Blair Lynn Sent Tuesday December PM To Berger Larry Subject RE NNG Reps out of office on Dec and Larry who would be two consistent people on each team to cover Thursday Friday Monday and Tuesday Thanks Lynn Original Message From Berger Larry Sent Tuesday December AM To Blair Lynn Zadow Raetta Subject NNG Reps out of office on Dec and The following people will be out of the office on Dec and th Dec South Central Debra Joe North Diana James Jerry Nancy Randy Dec South Central Debra Joe North Diana James Jerry Kathy Dec South Central Janet Robert Sherry North Karen Nancy Jean Kathy Larry

NNG Reps out of office on Dec and The following people will be out of the office on Dec and th Dec South Central Debra Joe North Diana James Jerry Nancy Randy Dec South Central Debra Joe North Diana James Jerry Kathy Dec South Central Janet Robert Sherry North Karen Nancy Jean Kathy Larry

UPS to resume service today Dec Rick and Lynn Raetta and I heard from the mailroom early this afternoon that UPS was suspending service with Enron We discussed other options and decided to inquire with UPS or Fed Ex about opening an account thru NNG When I contacted UPS I discovered that UPS is resuming service with Enron today The mailroom is aware of the situation Larry

NNGNov Production month Reservation and Commodity closesIn a joint effort between NNG Marketing and Gas Logistics attached are monthly invoicing calendars from December to June Each month details when reservation and commodity preliminary invoices are available and the dates when invoices are mailed to the customers The following information summarizes critical days for November Production Month Reservation and Commodity invoice mailings November Prod Month RESERVATION Market Services will be mailing out RESERVATION invoices on Monday December Please make any rate changes in CMS before PM Wednesday Nov If you make any rate changes to a contract in CMS on Thursday or Friday Nov or PLEASE CALL the Market Service representative responsible for that contract ASAP before pm so they can repath the contract in the accounting system before invoices are mailed out November Prod Month COMMODITY Market Services will be mailing out Commodity invoices on Wednesday Dec Please make any rate changes in CMS before pm Monday Dec If you make any rate changes to a contract in CMS on Tuesday Dec PLEASE CALL the Market Service representative responsible for that contract ASAP before pm that day so they can repath the contract in the accounting system

Customer AR Inquiry form Cc Attached is a copy of the Customer AR Inquiry form as mention in the NNG Accounts Receivable Collection procedures Please review and let me know your comments The MS Reps will fill out this form once it is identified that their customers have not paid their invoices on the due date Larry Original Message From Dietz Rick Sent Friday December PM To Zadow Raetta Berger Larry Blair Lynn Johnson Alice Cc Corman Shelley Neubauer Dave Cherry Paul Gilbert Steve Jones Dana Subject Important NNG Accounts Receivable Collection Procedures Importance High Please distribute these procedures to the Northern Customer Service teams and explain to them the importance of collecting our transportation revenues on time If they need further clarification or have questions please give me a call Rick

FW PAAHope it works this time Larry Original Message From Berger Larry Sent Mon AM To Blair Lynn Cc Subject PAA Lynn Here are the PAAs I talked with you about I would like to take the four of them to lunch also and was hoping you can attend as well How about mid September Sept Let me know Thanks Larry PAAFormDPdoc PAAFormJAdoc PAAFormKSdoc PAAFormRPdoc
Vacation days in July Cc Raetta In July I plan to take the following vacation days Thursday July Monday July Friday July See me if you have any questions Thanks Larry
Vacation Days in August Cc Raetta Per our conversation I will be taking the following vacation days in August Monday Aug Tuesday Aug Monday Aug Larry
Vacation in SeptI plan to take the following vacation days in Sept Friday Sep Monday Sep Thursday Sep See me if you have questions Larry
